name: Danger Closest
description: Zero explosive damage, similar to PhD Flopper. Damage can still be taken by Insanity Elementals.

name: Fatal Contraption
description: Spawns a Death Machine Power-Up.

name: Self Medication
description: Auto revive yourself. Keep all your perks. This includes Quick Revive.
activation: Auto-activates by getting a kill in last stand, 3x Activations

name: Lucky Crit
description: Improves your chances of activating an Alternate Ammo Type, like Turned, Dead Wire, etc.

name: Mind Blown
description: Gib the heads of all the zombies you can see, killing them.

name: Slaughter Slide
description: Create 2 lethal explosions by sliding.

name: Alchemical Antithesis
description: Every 10 points earned is instead awarded 1 ammo in the stock of the current weapon

name: Shopping Free
description: All purchases are free.

name: Near Death Experience
description: Revive, or be revived simply by being near other players. Revived players keep all their perks, including Quick Revive

name: On the House
description: Spawns a Random Perk Bottle Power Up.

name: In Plain Sight
description: All zombies ignore the player.

name: I'm Feeling Lucky
description: Spawns a random Power-Up in the map.

name: Crate Power
description: The next gun taken from the magic box comes Pack-a-Punched.
activation: Auto-activates next time you take a gun from the magic box

name: Anywhere But Here!
description: Instantly teleport to a random location. A concussive blast knocks away any nearby zombies, keeping the player safe.

name: Bullet Boost
description: Re-Pack your current Pack-a-Punched gun (if supported).

name: Killing Time
description: All zombies freeze in place for 20 seconds. If they are shot they will be annihilated when the time is up.

name: Licensed Contractor
description: Spawns a Carpenter Power-Up.

name: Always Done Swiftly
description: Walk faster when aiming. Raise and lower your weapon to aim more quickly.

name: Undead Man Walking
description: Slow down all zombies to shambling speed.

name: Wall Power
description: The next wall weapon purchased becomes Pack-a-Punched.
activation: Activates Immediately, Lasts until the player's next wall-buy gun purchase

name: Reign Drops
description: Spawns all the core power-ups at once

name: Stock Option
description: Ammo is taken from the player's stockpile instead of their weapon's magazine

name: Burned Out
description: The next time the player takes damage, nearby zombies burst into fire.

name: Flavor Hexed
description: Selects a random Mega Gobblegum of any rarity that is not in the player's loadout and awards it to the player

name: Kill Joy
description: Spawns an Insta-Kill Power-Up.

name: Pop Shocks
description: Melee attacks trigger an electrostatic discharge, electrocuting nearby Zombies.

name: Sword Flay
description: Melee attacks and any melee weapon will inflict 5x more damage on zombies.

name: Idle Eyes
description: All zombies ignore all players and stand idle.

name: Unquenchable
description: Can buy an extra Perk-a-Cola. The perk slot will be lost should the player go down.
activation: Auto-Activates when the player has 4 Maximum Perks

name: Board To Death
description: Zombies within 15 feet of a repaired board are killed. Does not work for bosses.

name: Crawl Space
description: All nearby zombies become crawlers.

name: Eye Candy
description: Overrides the colors you see

name: Arsenal Accelerator
description: Charge the player's special weapon faster

name: Temporal Gift
description: Power ups last longer (extra 30 seconds).

name: Immolation Liquidation
description: Spawns a Fire Sale Power-Up.

name: Who's Keeping Score?
description: Spawns a Double Points Power-Up.

name: Respin Cycle
description: Re-spins the weapons in the Mystery Box after it has been activated.

name: Phoenix Up
description: Revives all teammates. Teammates keep all of their Perks.

name: Coagulant
description: Longer bleedout time.

name: Ephemeral Enhancement
description: Turns the weapon in the player's hands into the Pack-A-Punched version. Players should be careful to remember that it only lasts for 60 seconds.

name: Projectile Vomiting
description: Zombies you kill with grenades or other large projectiles vomit uncontrollably.

name: Profit Sharing
description: Points you earn are also recieved by nearby players and vice versa.

name: Perkaholic
description: Gives the player all Perk-a-Colas in the map.

name: Head Drama
description: Any bullet which hits a zombie will damage its head.
activation: Activates Immediately, Lasts for the Remainder of the Round

name: Tone Death
description: A set of random silly zombie sounds and death sounds are played instead of the normal ones.
activation: Activates Immediately, activates each tenth zombie kill

name: Now You See Me
description: All zombies will chase the player.

name: Unbearable
description: The Mystery box re-spins automatically. The Mystery box will not move for several more uses.
activation: Auto-activates when a teddy bear appears in the Mystery box

name: Round Robbin'
description: Ends the current round. All players gain 1600 points

name: Fear in Headlights
description: Zombies seen by the player will not move. Players should remember this will not affect zombies that are behind them.

name: Firing On All Cylinders
description: Can fire while sprinting. Similar to the Gung-Ho perk from Multiplayer.

name: Aftertaste
description: Keep all Perks after being revived. This will not keep the player's Quick Revive in solo.

name: Board Games
description: Fixing one board at a barrier fixes all the boards at that barrier. You only get the points from the first board repaired.

name: Arms Grace
description: Respawn with the guns the player had when they bled out.
activation: Activates Immediately, Lasts until next respawn

name: Power Vacuum
description: Power-Ups spawn more often. The drop chance is greatly increased, the normal cap of only 4 drops per round is ignored.

name: Disorderly Combat
description: Gives a random gun every 10 seconds. It should be noted that if the player uses this while holding a Pack-a-Punched weapon, all subsequent weapons will be Pack-a-Punched as well

name: Dead of Nuclear Winter
description: Spawns a Nuke Power-Up.

name: Extra Credit
description: Spawns a Personal Points Power-Up worth 1,250 points (2500 points if Double Points is active).

name: Newtonian Negation
description: Zombies killed fall straight up.

name: Impatient
description: Respawn near the end of the current round instead of at the start of the next round.

name: Armamental Accomplishment
description: Switch weapons and recover from performing melee attacks faster. Reload and use items more quickly

name: Secret Shopper
description: Any gun wall-buy can be used to buy ammo for any gun. (Note that you cannot buy ammo for Wonder Weapons.)

name: Soda Fountain
description: Perk purchase limit is ignored. Every perk you buy, a random perk is awarded along with the perk you bought.
activation: Auto-activates when buying a perk, 5 Activations

name: Cache Back
description: Spawns a Max Ammo Power-Up.
